# Including PTF Ic/Ic-bl with P200 or LRIS data, one with DEIMOS data (12hni), one with gmosS data(10bip), and two with SDSS data (09q, 12hvv)
# ordered by RA except for 11gcj and 12gzk that are added at last
# Only one host is not observed at all
#	09dh (extremely faint, non-det in SDSS)
# Compared to platefitflux_071217.txt
#	one uncertain host is added: 12gzk (SDSS)
# Line fluxes from subdirs, refer to the subdir/platefitflux-*-*.txt files for source of data
#
# galnum           subdir     PTFname and region        OII         H_gamma       H_beta       OIII_4959     OIII_5007      H_alpha      NII_6584      SII_6717      SII_6731
